posts.post_content:
This card is absolutely ridiculous for the grade.  It took me awhile to figure out why the grade is so low, and there is a tiny wrinkle at the bottom left of Street's portrait.  Still seems more like a 3.5 or 4 to me, but either way the eye appeal is insane.

$675 ppff sold
(plus ST in WA state)

Luke I am offering 550 for the T202 Johnson I know it's a big stretch but it's what I can afford but I totally understand when you decline. But thanks Luke for your time and you always have awesome cards!

Joe K
Thank you very much for the offer Joe.  I'm going to pass as I took it in trade at a higher number.  But I appreciate it, and hope you've been well!
